Plot: charlie and muriel lang have led simple lives - for most of their existance. that's until they win $4 million on the lottery! there is a problem, however. prior to winning the lottery, charlie had eaten at a cafe and hadn't been able to tip the waitress. he had promised her, jokingly, that if he won the lottery he'd give her half of it. this is why his wife, muriel decides to leave him. she doesn't want the waitress to get a cent of their money. infact she wants all $4 million for herself!

charlie lang, a new york cop with a heart of gold, wins a share of the lottery. however, the day before, having been caught without enough money to tip waitress (yvonne), charlie offers her half the winnings. charlie's wife, muriel, is the complete opposite of her husband. she wants more and more money, and she's not impressed by charlie's honest and kind nature. as charlie and muriel grow apart, charlie and yvonne grow together.
Title: it could happen to you
